Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.modules

Class MatchMaker

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.modules.MatchMaker
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonCommandChangeListener
public class MatchMaker extends Object implements JsonCommandChangeListener
Handles the client request of joining a match If the client requests to enter an already present match it connects to it Otherwise it creates a new waiting match and connects the client to it

  • Constructor Details

    • MatchMaker

      public MatchMaker(ClientHandler clientHandler, String clientNickname, Queue<Match> waitingMatches, Queue<Match> activeMatches, MatchChangeListener mcl)
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - the client handler that handles the current client
      clientNickname - the client nickname
      waitingMatches - the list of the waiting matches owned by the server
      activeMatches - the list of the active matches owned by the server
      mcl - the reference to the match change listener that will be notified when the match is ready to start

  • Method Details

    • jsonCommandChange

      public void jsonCommandChange(JsonCommandChangeEvent event)
      Fired when the message with the requested match is received from the client If the client requests to enter an already present match it connects to it Otherwise it creates a new waiting match and connects the client to it
      Specified by:
      jsonCommandChange in interface JsonCommandChangeListener

    • sendJoinSuccessfulResponseToClient

      private void addClientToMatch(Match match)

    • findRequestedMatch

      private Match findRequestedMatch(int numPlayers, boolean expertMatch)
      Searches for the requested match in waiting matches based on num players and expert property
      Returns:
      the requested match or null if there is no waiting matches with requested properties

    • addNewWaitingMatch

      private void addNewWaitingMatch(int numPlayers, boolean expertMatch)
      Add a new match with the given properties to the waiting matches

    • moveFromWaitingToActive

      private void moveFromWaitingToActive(Match match)
      Moves the given match from the waiting ones to the active ones Then notifies the server that a match is ready to start
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the match is not ready to start
